animeTitle: All-Free kono Natsu Ichioshi Monogatari Campaign Kokuchi Douga
otherNames: SUNTORY x Osomatsu-san, Muttsu-ko-ryuu All-Free no Tanoshimi-kata, オールフリー　この夏イチオシ物語キャンペーン告知動画
synopsis: A collaboration between Suntory's All-Free a zero-alcohol/zero-calorie/zero-carb beverage tasting like beer and Osomatsu-san.
